rows.label: qst201813_msg0001
rows.name: Pepe... Where could you be...?

rows.label: qst201813_msg0002
rows.name:
Uh, hi? Hello?
You look kinda forlorn...
Did something happen?

rows.label: qst201813_msg0003
rows.name:
Yeeeek?!
You can understand me?

rows.label: qst201813_msg0004
rows.name:
Yes!
Yes, I can.

rows.label: qst201813_msg0005
rows.name:
...Hm, yes, I can see you're different
from other people...

rows.label: qst201813_msg0006
rows.name: You might actually be more like us!

rows.label: qst201813_msg0007
rows.name:
All you need to know is that you can
tell me about anything that's bothering
you.

rows.label: qst201813_msg0008
rows.name:
...Well, okay then. You see, I have
this childhood friend named Pepe.

rows.label: qst201813_msg0009
rows.name:
However, he went off some time ago
and has yet to come back.

rows.label: qst201813_msg0010
rows.name:
He doesn't seem to be in the village,
and I can't very well go off looking for
him myself...

rows.label: qst201813_msg0011
rows.name:
I'm worried he might've gotten
wrapped up in some bad stuff.

rows.label: qst201813_msg0012
rows.name:
Yes, it makes sense!
Don't worry, Uka'll sort it out!

rows.label: qst201813_msg0013
rows.name: Really?!

rows.label: qst201813_msg0014
rows.name: Absolutely! Just leave it to me!

rows.label: qst201813_msg0015
rows.name: I bet I know what happened.

rows.label: qst201813_msg0016
rows.name:
I'm sure Pepe has been
taken away by Superbians!

rows.label: qst201813_msg0017
rows.name: What?!

rows.label: qst201813_msg0018
rows.name:
Yeah, it's clear as day. Have you seen
the weird gizmos they put on Divine
 Beasts? Superbians can't be good guys!

rows.label: qst201813_msg0039
rows.name: But don't worry, I'll make things right!

rows.label: qst201813_msg0019
rows.name:
But... We haven't seen any Superbians
around, so it seems pretty unlikely...

rows.label: qst201813_msg0020
rows.name: No, I'm dead certain!

rows.label: qst201813_msg0021
rows.name:
Poor little Pepe... He must be so afraid,
shivering and alone somewhere!

rows.label: qst201813_msg0022
rows.name: Mimi, you wait here!

rows.label: qst201813_msg0023
rows.name:
Y-yes, okay...
I can count on you, then?

rows.label: qst201813_msg0024
rows.name:
That's all well and good, but we
can't just go off blindly.

rows.label: qst201813_msg0025
rows.name: Maybe someone'll know something...

rows.label: qst201813_msg0026
rows.name: I suggest you visit our village, then.

rows.label: qst201813_msg0027
rows.name:
Pepe might have passed through there
at some point...

rows.label: qst201813_msg0028
rows.name: There's a Phonex village?

rows.label: qst201813_msg0029
rows.name:
Yes! It's in Yeshiva Harbor.
That's where Pepe and I were born.

rows.label: qst201813_msg0030
rows.name: Would you be able to show us the way?

rows.label: qst201813_msg0031
rows.name: I'd love to, but, uh, that's...

rows.label: qst201813_msg0032
rows.name:
Really scary monsters appear on the
road to the village sometimes.

rows.label: qst201813_msg0033
rows.name: They even went after me once...

rows.label: qst201813_msg0034
rows.name:
I've been afraid to go back, frankly.
I'd rather just hang out here.

rows.label: qst201813_msg0035
rows.name: That's so terrible...

rows.label: qst201813_msg0036
rows.name: Anyway, I'm on it.

rows.label: qst201813_msg0037
rows.name:
Yeshiva Harbor you said, right?
We'll go ask around!

rows.label: qst201813_msg0038
rows.name:
Thank you so much!
Pepe's life is in your hands...
